Name: Petrified
About the game: After stumbling upon an old rickety house that has been rumored to be haunted, a group of kids take it upon themselves to be ghost hunters and to investigate the house themselves. It turns out that a ghost roams the house with the intention of petrifying any trespasser. Play with four players as either a hunter or a ghost and accomplish the goal of removing the enemy from existence. Hunter Work as a team with other hunters to locate the ghost and deplete it of its energy. Your weapon is your flashlight. Use the flashlight beam to drain the ghost's energy. Search areas of the map to find power ups. Use various power ups to help track and locate the ghost. Ghost Use various items in the environment to scare hunters. Sneak up on the hunters and scare them directly. Avoid the hunters' flashlight beams and tracking power ups. Fill each hunters' scare meter to petrify them.
